result.html: Caith uait éThrow it away.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫ uait éThrow it away.

result.eng: He stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ga: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.orig: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.html: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé ón ól b'in é an príoṁrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.

result.eng: It is two miles away from the house.
result.ga: Tá sé dhá mhíle ón teach
result.orig: Tá sé dhá mhíle ón teach
result.html: Tá sé dhá mhíle ón teachIt is two miles away from the house.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ḋá ṁíle ón teaċIt is two miles away from the house.

result.html: Fan amach ón dream sinStay away from those people.
result.ponchtml: Fan amaċ ón dream sinStay away from those people.

result.html: Tá sé ag obair leisHe is working away.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag obair leisHe is working away.

result.eng: I live a long way away, on the edge of the city.
result.ga: Tá mise i mo chónaí tamall fada amach ar imeall na cathrach
result.orig: Tá mise i mo chónaí tamall fada amach ar imeall na cathrach
result.html: Tá mise i mo chónaí tamall fada amach ar imeall na cathrachI live a long way away, on the edge of the city.
result.ponchtml: Tá mise i mo ċónaí tamall fada amaċ ar imeall na caṫraċI live a long way away, on the edge of the city.

result.eng: Hold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ga: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.orig: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.html: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ponchtml: Coinniġ greim orṫu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.

result.eng: They only live a couple of miles away from me.
result.ga: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimse
result.orig: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimse
result.html: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimseThey only live a couple of miles away from me.
result.ponchtml: Níl siad ina gcónaí aċ cúpla míle uaimseThey only live a couple of miles away from me.

result.eng: For the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ga: Ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.orig: Ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.html: Ar do bhás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ponchtml: Ar do ḃás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!

result.eng: There's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ga: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.orig: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.html: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ponchtml: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a ḋéanaṁ díom nuair a ḃeas mé ar ẛiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?

result.eng: The city was a couple hundred miles away.
result.ga: Bhí an baile mór fá chupla céad míle dóibh
result.orig: Bhí an baile mór fá chupla céad míle dóibh
result.html: Bhí an baile mór fá chupla céad míle dóibhThe city was a couple hundred miles away.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an baile mór fá ċupla céad míle dóiḃThe city was a couple hundred miles away.
